h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Enter the Secret Area in Chapter 1
content: Once you've rung the three bells, you'll be automatically transported to the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple. Go up the stairs and there will be a Keeper's Shrine for you to interact with. You can then proceed, where you can take on Elder Jinchi the secret boss of the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Enter the Secret Area in Chapter 1'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've rung the three bells, you'll be automatically transported to the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple. Go up the stairs and there will be a Keeper's Shrine for you to interact with. You can then proceed, where you can take on Elder Jinchi the secret boss of the area.
